author: maxb
msg: mod_dav_svn: Move the four source files which exist solely to implement a
REPORT handler into a reports/ subdirectory.
Add 'sources' directive to include the moved source.

author: maxb
msg: Ooops, omitted this file from the previous commit.

author: maxb
msg: mod_dav_svn: Fork general authz related code out of update.c into a new file,
and alter to observe double-underscore policy too.
* authz.c: New file, forked from update.c
* deadprops.c, file_revs.c, liveprops.c, lock.c, log.c, replay.c, update.c,

author: maxb
msg: Migrate some general utility code from mod_dav_svn's update.c to util.c,
and apply double-underscore policy to it whilst doing so.
Move to this file, adding underscore.
* file_revs.c, replay.c, update.c: Change callers to new name.

author: julianfoad
msg: In 'server-vsn.py', support 'https:' URLs.  Also handle redirect requests
(302), if the requested resource resides temporarily under a different URL.
Also use better Python APIs.  In httplib, the HTTP and HTTPS functions are
included just for backward compatibility.  Moreover, HTTPS support is only
available if the socket module is compiled with SSL support.  So, use
Do not import "string" library as it is not necessary.
(print_version): Handle the HTTPS scheme.  Use 'HTTPConnection' and
'HTTPSConnection' instead of 'HTTP' and 'HTTPS' functions.  Do not
regard a '302' redirect as an error, use its header info anyway.
